FuncDef: The display igmp-snooping general-query statistics command displays statistics about General Query messages sent or forwarded by the IGMP snooping proxy device of a specified VSI. Only in mode of IGMP Snooping enhance, qinq-mapping or qinq-stacking is needed to configure in VSI, the command can get data.

ParaDef.Info:
Displays statistics about General Query messages of a specified VSI.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported. When double quotation marks are used around the string, spaces are allowed in the string.

Examples: <HUAWEI> display igmp-snooping general-query statistics vsi vsi-a
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To check statistics about General Query messages sent or forwarded by the IGMP snooping proxy device of a specified VSI, run the display igmp-snooping general-query statistics command.
